page.title: 20CREDITS
page.content: The information compiled for this block in the Domesday Project has been collected, collated and written by children and staff of the following schools in South Tyneside Local Education Authority; Bede Burn J M I Biddick Hall County Junior Boldon Church of England Primary Chuter Ede Comprehensive Hedworthfield Primary Hedworthfield Comprehensive Hedworth Lane Primary Lukes Lane Junior Mixed Monkton Junior Mixed St. Mary's Primary St. Joseph's Primary Simonside Primary Valley View Primary West Boldon Primary
